page.title: 06STANTON-UPON-HINE-HEATH
page.content: There are about hundred and fifty people in{Stanton}and it is a small friendly village with a{caring {community.} There are few things to do in the village.It is very important to have a village shop because the town is about 9 miles away. The{children}go to{St.Mary's school} in Shawbury,travelling by taxi.The school in the village closed 18 years ago. Since 1970 a quarter of the{houses} have been built.A third of the people are{born and bred}in the village and all the others are{newcomers.}Everyone knows everyone in the village and people like living there. The village has got three farms ,a blacksmith,a shoemaker and a shop,a pub and a{church.}The church is over 1000 years old.
